Package com.project.moviebooking.util

package com.project.moviebooking.util
The "util" package contains utility classes and helper functions used across various modules within the movie booking application.

Utility classes in this package offer reusable functionalities, helper methods, or common operations that assist in different parts of the movie booking system. These classes provide support for commonly performed tasks such as string manipulation, date/time operations, data formatting, and more.

Organizing utility classes in this package helps centralize and manage commonly used functionalities, promoting re-usability and maintainability across different modules of the movie booking application.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.project.moviebooking
    The root package for the Movie Booking application.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EmailSender
    Utility class to handle sending OTPs via email.
    OtpGenerator
    Utility class responsible for generating OTPs (One-Time Passwords).
    Utils
    Utility class that provides transformation methods for DTOs and entities, as well as some helper functions related to user authentication and roles.
